#nullable enable
namespace TestApp;
public partial class Contact
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Creates a new instance with <see cref="Name"/> set to the specified value.
    /// </summary>
    public Contact WithName(string value)
    {
        return new Contact
        {
            Name = value,
            Email = this.Email,
            PhoneExtension = this.PhoneExtension,
        };
    }


    /// <summary>
    /// Creates a new instance with <see cref="Email"/> set to the specified value.
    /// </summary>
    public Contact WithEmail(string? value)
    {
        return new Contact
        {
            Name = this.Name,
            Email = value,
            PhoneExtension = this.PhoneExtension,
        };
    }


    /// <summary>
    /// Creates a new instance with <see cref="PhoneExtension"/> set to the specified value.
    /// </summary>
    public Contact WithPhoneExtension(int? value)
    {
        return new Contact
        {
            Name = this.Name,
            Email = this.Email,
            PhoneExtension = value,
        };
    }
}
